snippet: Following is a letter from Amir Hekmati, who has been incarcerated in Iran for more than two years on espionage charges, addressed to Secretary of State John Kerry.
lead_paragraph: Following is a letter from Amir Hekmati, who has been incarcerated in Iran for more than two years on espionage charges, addressed to Secretary of State John Kerry.

headline.main: Text of Letter From Hekmati to  Kerry
